duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide compassionate and high-quality acute care services to patients in the emergency department.
Collaborate with the medical team to drive improvements in quality, patient satisfaction, and overall healthcare outcomes.
Adhere to ACLS/BLS/PALS guidelines and maintain current certifications for emergency care provision.
Assist in achieving the goals set for the emergency medicine team, aligning with hospital leadership.

education_certification.credential: Current, unrestricted license and 1 year of EM background/experience preferred
